title: Remove unnecessary caffeine.xyz/caffeine.ai references

requirements.text: Remove the public-facing footer attribution/link to caffeine (including any caffeine.ai/caffeine.xyz/caffine.xyz URLs and UTM parameters) from the website UI, and replace it with a simple English copyright line for the shop.

quotes: i mean to remove unnessary caffine.xyz

acceptanceCriteria: The footer no longer contains any link or text referencing caffeine.ai, caffeine.xyz, or caffine.xyz.
The footer shows an English copyright line (e.g., "Â© <current year> Subrin Kitab Pasal. All rights reserved.").
No other user-facing UI text contains caffeine.ai/caffeine.xyz/caffine.xyz.

requirements.text: Remove or replace any references to the domain "caffeine.xyz" or "caffine.xyz" in repository documentation and configuration examples (e.g., deployment/domain docs), using a neutral placeholder domain (e.g., "example.com") if an example is needed.

quotes: i mean to remove unnessary caffine.xyz

acceptanceCriteria: Repository docs/config examples contain no occurrences of "caffeine.xyz" or "caffine.xyz".
If domain examples are needed in docs, they use a neutral placeholder (e.g., example.com) and remain in English.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not change the existing custom-domain support functionality or DNS guidance beyond removing/replacing caffeine.xyz/caffine.xyz references.
Do not modify Google Analytics behavior or measurement ID configuration as part of this change.
